snippet: To get the guilty summer TV season started, on Saturday there are a remake of “The Blue Lagoon,” on Lifetime, and “Piranhaconda,” on Syfy.
abstract: Mike Hale recommends television movies The Blue Lagoon: The Awakening, on Lifetime, and Piranhaconda, on Syfy, for viewers seeking disreputable summer entertainment.
lead_paragraph: To get the guilty summer TV season started, on Saturday there are a remake of “The Blue Lagoon,” on Lifetime, and “Piranhaconda,” on Syfy.

headline.seo: New ‘Blue Lagoon’ on Lifetime and ‘Piranhaconda’ on Syfy
headline.main: Smile! It’s Time for a Guilty Plunge Into Summer TV
headline.print_headline: Smile! It’s Time for a Guilty Plunge Into Summer TV
